import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button } from "reactstrap"; import { FiArrowLeft } from "react-icons/fi"; import CreatableSelect from 'react-select/creatable'; import Dialog from '@mui/material/Dialog'; import DialogActions from '@mui/material/DialogActions'; import DialogContent from '@mui/material/DialogContent'; import DialogTitle from '@mui/material/DialogTitle'; import SunEditor from 'suneditor-react'; import Checkbox from '@mui/material/Checkbox'; import FormControlLabel from '@mui/material/FormControlLabel'; import Dropzone from 'react-dropzone-uploader' import 'react-dropzone-uploader/dist/styles.css' import "../online/online.css" import 'suneditor/dist/css/suneditor.min.css'; const options = [ { value: 'chocolate', label: 'Chocolate' }, { value: 'strawberry', label: 'Strawberry' }, { value: 'vanilla', label: 'Vanilla' } ] const AddProduct = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [newBrandName, setNewBrandName] = useState(''); const handleClose = () => { setOpen(false); }; const handleChange = (e) => { if(e && e.__isNew__) { options.push({ value: e.label, label: e.value }) setNewBrandName(e.value) setOpen(true) } }; const addBrand = () => { console.log("123123") } const getUploadParams = ({ meta }) => { return { url: 'https://httpbin.org/post' } } const handleChangeStatus = ({ meta, file }, status) => { console.log(status, meta, file) } const handleSubmit = (files, allFiles) => { console.log(files.map(f => f.meta)) allFiles.forEach(f => f.remove()) } return( <>

} label="Sell on Point-of-Sale" labelPlacement="end"/>

Make this product active and available for sale in-store

Inventory

The type of product we choose determines how we manage inventory and reporting.

Standard Product

This product is a single SKU with its own inventory.

Variant Product

This is a group of similar products which have different attributes, like size or color. Each variant is a unique SKU with its own inventory.

Composite Product

This product is made up of specified quantities of one or more products. A composite is a single SKU but uses the inventory of the products within it.
